name: MentalHospitalSimulator
description:
You are the medic in the mental hospital and no one won’t hel you. Try to keep all you patients alive.

How to play: RightClick to move LeftClick to pick and item, then select inventory cell to hold it. To use item, just pick it and use on your target.

All patients are diffferent and have their own behaviour:

Maniac: Susceptible to mood swings. Periodically goes into hysteria. You can calm him down with sleeping pills or sedatives.

Pyromaniac: He becomes more nervous when trying to drink water. Quickly falls into hysterics, calms down when tired, or from sleeping pills with sedatives.

MeatFeaver: Nervous, if he eats meat he becomes hysterical, without meat he gradually becomes lethargic. The tantrum ends when he gets hungry, or gets tired.

CaproKeper: Harmless, sleeps a lot, not sociable. He goes to the toilet for himself, after that he becomes more nervous, stops eating and drinking. It calms down if you just remove everything, do an enema, or give sleeping pills.
